item.title: Episode 13 COMING SOON
item.description: PARKS AND PARKS ARE ON THE WAY BACK AND BETTER THAN EVERY!

item.title: Episode 13 "COMPUTER LOVE"
item.description: DOROTHY AND LARRY DISCUSSES HOW SOCIAL NETWORKS/SITES CAN CONNECT PEOPLE TO BECOME LOVERS OR MEETING THEY MATE THEY WILL SPEND THEIR LIFE WITH. DOROTHY AND LARRY ALSO DISCUSS THE PROS AND CONS AND DO YOU FALL UNDER THIS TOPIC? MAYBE YOU DO.

item.title: Episode 11 Parks n Parks Talks " Lovers and Friends"
item.description: Dorothy and Larry discuss should friends become lovers??? That is a question that one must ask if they are feeling their friend to the point of becoming their lover.
item.dc:creator: PARKS N PARKS TALKS

item.title: Episode 10 Parks n Parks Talks " The Cheaters"
item.description: Dorothy and Larry have a interesting discussion about the reason for men and women cheaters. The factors that may cause them to cheat and gives advice on on what may not to do to make matters worse.
item.dc:creator: PARKS N PARKS TALKS
item.itunes:summary: Dorothy and Larry have a interesting discussion about the reason for men and women cheaters. The factors that may cause them to cheat and gives advice on on what may not to do to make matters worse.

item.title: Episode 9 "Families Dealing With The Economy"? ??
item.description: Dorothy and Larry talks about how families handles the harsh economy of today and how to cope with this obstacle???Maybe!!!
item.dc:creator: PARKS N PARKS TALKS

item.title: Episode 8 " A Family Affair"
item.description: Should issues determine your perception of one another in the family? Once problems in the family can sometimes causes differences and distance between family members. Problems which are left unresolved at times. But when we resolves those issues with apologies, does our family member remain that loving supportive relative as before ? Will an apology brings us closer or does it depends on how deep the situations offended a member in the family an apology or no apology, you may never get that closeness back as once was before.
item.dc:creator: PARKS N PARKS TALKS

Will an apology brings us closer or does it depends on how deep the situations offended a member in the family an apology or no apology, you may never get that closeness back as once was before.

item.title: Episode 7 Parks N Parks Talks " The Misconceptions Of Black People"
item.description: Dorothy and Larry discuss the misconceptions that black people face. A funny and light hearten discussion that is the first installment of misconceptions of the races.
item.dc:creator: PARKS N PARKS TALKS
item.itunes:summary: Dorothy and Larry discuss the misconceptions that black people face. A funny and light hearten discussion that is the first installment of misconceptions of the races.

item.title: Episode 6 PARKS N PARKS TALKS "NEITHER ONE OF US".
item.description: LOVE SOMETIMES PLAYS A MAJOR ROLE IN OUR LIVES. WE DESIRE IT. WE LIVE FOR IT, WE GET CONSUME IN IT. RELATIONSHIPS REFLECTS UPON ALL OF THE THOSE EMOTIONAL CHANGES THAT LOVES BRINGS. WE FALL IN LOVE WITH EVERY ATTENTION OF REMAINING TIL DEATH DUE UP PART. WE LOVE LIFE AND GROW WITH OUR SIGNIFICANT OTHER AS TIME GOES BY. WE CREATE FAMILIES, WE SHARE GOOD AND BAD TIMES TOGETHER. SLEEP IN THE SAME BED NIGHT AFTER NIGHT. WE SPEAK THE WORDS "I LOVE YOU AT LEAST 100 TIMES OF YEAR. BUT WHAT IF THINGS CHANGED AND THE PERSON YOU KNOW AND LOVE SEEM TO HAVE FEELINGS OF LEAVING THE RELATIONSHIP. OR BOTH OF YOU DECIDES THE PARTY ISN'T JUMPING ANYMORE. BUT YOU REMAIN FOR COUNTLESS REASONS. RATHER FOR YOUR KIDS, OR FEAR OF HURTING . PERHAPS THE FRIENDSHIP CONNECTION IS STILL THERE. IF THE RELATIONSHIP IS OVER. I MEAN TRULY OVER. SOMEONE HAVE TO FINALLY BE THAT PERSON TO SAY "GOODBYE"
item.dc:creator: PARKS N PARKS TALKS
item.itunes:summary:

WE FALL IN LOVE WITH EVERY ATTENTION OF REMAINING TIL DEATH DUE UP PART. WE LOVE LIFE AND GROW WITH OUR SIGNIFICANT OTHER AS TIME GOES BY. WE CREATE FAMILIES, WE SHARE GOOD AND BAD TIMES TOGETHER. SLEEP IN THE SAME BED NIGHT AFTER NIGHT. WE SPEAK THE WORDS "I LOVE YOU AT LEAST 100 TIMES OF YEAR.
BUT WHAT IF THINGS CHANGED AND THE PERSON YOU KNOW AND LOVE SEEM TO HAVE FEELINGS OF LEAVING THE RELATIONSHIP. OR BOTH OF YOU DECIDES THE PARTY ISN'T JUMPING ANYMORE. BUT YOU REMAIN FOR COUNTLESS REASONS. RATHER FOR YOUR KIDS, OR FEAR OF HURTING . PERHAPS THE FRIENDSHIP CONNECTION IS STILL THERE. IF THE RELATIONSHIP IS OVER. I MEAN TRULY OVER. SOMEONE HAVE TO FINALLY BE THAT PERSON TO SAY "GOODBYE"

item.title: Episode 4" COUGARVILLE"
item.description: OLDER WOMEN WHO DATES YOUNGER MEN. OLDER WOMEN ARE MAKING THIS A HOT TRENDY WAY OF DATING NOW AND DAYS. SOCIETY HAS LABELED THEM AS "COUGARS". WHAT'S THE BIG SENSATION? WHAT DO YOUNGER MEN HAVE THAT OLDER MEN DO NOT HAVE? HOLLYWOOD ARE FULL OF HOT AND SEXY COUGARS, SUCH AS ... MARIAH CAREY AND DEMI MOORE. WHAT ARE THE PROS AND CONS? DOES SEX PLAY AN IMPORTANT ROLE IN CHOOSING YOUNGER MEN? OR IS IT A FOUNTAIN OF YOUTH?
item.dc:creator: PARKS N PARKS TALKS

item.title: PARKS N PARKS TALKS "REMINISCING THE 70'S"
item.description: DOROTHY AND LARRY REMINISCE OVER THE FUNKY FLY 70'S . THE 70'S WAS ONE OF HIPPEST AND COOLEST ERA TO BE APART OF.FROM THE PLATFORM SHOES, THE AFROS, TV SHOWS, MUSIC,MOVIES AND THOSE MEMORABLE COMMERCIALS. WE HOPE THAT YOU ALL HAVE SOME ENJOYABLE MEMORIES TO ENJOY AS WELL. FEEDBACK IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED!
